questions.question: What is the primary color of the bottle's label, visually dominant in the product image?
Considering the overall shape, what geometric form best describes the container?
Based on the image, what material appears to constitute the bottle's body?
What is the visible color of the bottle's cap, in contrast to the label?
Observing the label, what specific vitamin does the product contain, as clearly written?
What is the form of the nutritional supplement presented inside the bottle?
How many softgels are explicitly stated on the label to be inside?
What is the prominently displayed dosage of the vitamin in mcg (micrograms)?
What is the alternative dosage unit of the vitamin, parenthetically presented?
What single word describes the product type as labeled on the packaging?
What is the brand name visibly printed on the product container?
Based on the label, are artificial colors listed as ingredients?
According to the label, are artificial flavors used in the supplement?
Does the label specify the presence or absence of gluten in the product?
Based on the label, does the supplement contain lactose?
